librarian.messages.backup_failed.action_: Failed to back up hotbar page: %1$s
librarian.messages.cache_cleared.action_: The hotbar cache has been cleared
librarian.messages.metadata.authors_adde: %1$s has been added to the list of authors for this page.
librarian.messages.metadata.authors_alre: %1$s is already in the list of authors for this page.
librarian.messages.metadata.authors_clea: All authors have been removed from this page.
librarian.messages.metadata.authors_empt: No authors are listed in the current page.
librarian.messages.metadata.authors_not_: %1$s isn't listed as an author for this page.
librarian.messages.metadata.authors_remo: %1$s has been removed from the list of authors for this page.
librarian.messages.metadata.deleted: The current page's metadata has been deleted.
librarian.messages.metadata.description: The current page's description is currently set to %1$s.
librarian.messages.metadata.description_: The current page currently doesn't have a description.
The current page's description has been set to %1$s.
The current page's description has been reset to defaults.
librarian.messages.metadata.name: The current page's name is currently set to %1$s.
librarian.messages.metadata.name_not_set: The current page currently doesn't have a name.
librarian.messages.metadata.name_set: The current page has been renamed to %1$s.
librarian.messages.metadata.name_reset: The current page's name has been reset to defaults.
librarian.messages.metadata.no_data_to_d: The current page's metadata has been purged.
librarian.messages.possible_overwrite_de: You are attempting to overwrite an existing hotbar row with data that doesn't exactly match. Are you sure you want to continue?
